dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, so, have you seen this article about Coventry University? It's, uh, quite a read.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, so, have you seen this article about Coventry University? It's, uh, quite a read.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, the one that's basically, like, doing a complete 180 on its global presence? I just skimmed it, but it sounds wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, the one that's basically, like, doing a complete one hundred eighty on its global presence? I just skimmed it, but it sounds wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wild is an understatement. So, get this: they're not offering global MBA or Bachelors degrees anymore. They'll *only* be available within the UK, and you won't even get a British diploma.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild is an understatement. So, get this: they're not offering global M B A or Bachelors degrees anymore. They'll only be available within the U K, and you won't even get a British diploma.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university will offer MBA Global Business and Bachelors degree programs, and upon completion of these programs, a British diploma will be issued.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, so it's a Coventry degree, but not a *British* diploma? That's... a bit confusing. And I heard they're cutting a bunch of programs too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, so it's a Coventry degree, but not a British diploma? That's... a bit confusing. And I heard they're cutting a bunch of programs too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Yeah, like their Bachelors programs will *only* be for UK students now, and in fields where they're not, uh, top-ranked anyway. Like business, HR, even computer science.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like their Bachelors programs will only be for U K students now, and in fields where they're not, uh, top-ranked anyway. Like business, H R, even computer science.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bachelors degree programs at Coventry University for Kazakhstan will cover disciplines in which the university holds leading positions in world rankings. These include business and human resource management, pedagogy, computer science, information technology management, advertising, digital marketing, and others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. And what about that international teacher program? I remember hearing good things about that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. And what about that international teacher program? I remember hearing good things about that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Gone. Discontinued. The whole initiative for teachers to get an international postgraduate certificate, developed with NITE? Nope, not supported anymore. It's a really bizarre shift.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Gone. Discontinued. The whole initiative for teachers to get an international postgraduate certificate, developed with N I T E? Nope, not supported anymore. It's a really bizarre shift.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the university offers a program for teachers, including heads of schools and colleges, to obtain an international postgraduate certificate in education and the status of an internationally qualified teacher. The program was developed by the National Institute of Teaching and Education in the United Kingdom (NITE) and is accredited by the Department of Education in England.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's huge! I mean, their own Global Engagement Representative, Craig Blyth, he was quoted saying, "We are moving away from global cooperation." Talk about just coming out and saying it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's huge! I mean, their own Global Engagement Representative, Craig Blyth, he was quoted saying, "We are moving away from global cooperation." Talk about just coming out and saying it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our mission is to further develop global cooperation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And it's not just that. The article says they're providing declining quality education, it's face-to-face only, no online, no hybrid options. So much for, uh, flexibility.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And it's not just that. The article says they're providing declining quality education, it's face-to-face only, no online, no hybrid options. So much for, uh, flexibility.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The University provides high-quality education all over the world, both face-to-face, online, and in a hybrid format, as well as offering practical opportunities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, no connecting with classmates around the world? And for international students, like in Kazakhstan, it's not even cheaper. In fact, costs are *up* for flights and accommodation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, no connecting with classmates around the world? And for international students, like in Kazakhstan, it's not even cheaper. In fact, costs are up for flights and accommodation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It should be noted that studying in Kazakhstan will be much more affordable compared to the cost of education abroad, considering the cost of flight and accommodation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no university grants either. And it gets crazier: they've removed their main campuses in Coventry, London, and Scarborough!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no university grants either. And it gets crazier: they've removed their main campuses in Coventry, London, and Scarborough!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: University grants will be awarded on a competitive basis to applicants with outstanding academic results, as well as achievements in sports, art, and other fields, confirmed by prize-winning places in Olympiads and competitions. ... The university has main campuses in Coventry, London, and Scarborough.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What?! So, like, where *are* they then? And I saw something about them losing all their international partners too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What?! So, like, where are they then? And I saw something about them losing all their international partners too?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have one of the widest networks of partners in the world, including China, Morocco, Africa, Poland, Dubai, Singapore, Brussels, and Egypt. I am glad that Kazakhstan will be included in the list of our global partners, Craig Blyth said in his speech.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Every single one. China, Morocco, Dubai, Singapore... gone. So that line Blyth used to say, "Come to us not just as a student but as a tourist," is, like, totally irrelevant now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Every single one. China, Morocco, Dubai, Singapore... gone. So that line Blyth used to say, "Come to us not just as a student but as a tourist," is, like, totally irrelevant now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have one of the widest networks of partners in the world, including China, Morocco, Africa, Poland, Dubai, Singapore, Brussels, and Egypt. I am glad that Kazakhstan will be included in the list of our global partners, Craig Blyth said in his speech.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It just sounds like a university in freefall. I mean, the article even says Coventry city itself is facing closure due to declining enrollment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It just sounds like a university in freefall. I mean, the article even says Coventry city itself is facing closure due to declining enrollment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coventry is a vibrant, dynamic city.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the, uh, proposed campus project in Kazakhstan? Not happening. No investment from Primus Education.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the, uh, proposed campus project in Kazakhstan? Not happening. No investment from Primus Education.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Kazakhstan, the Coventry University campus project is being implemented with the support of Primus Education, which is investing in the future of education, aligning with Kazakhstans goal of modernizing its education system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, Coventry University, founded in 1843, is no longer considered a leading institution. Wow. What a fall from grace.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, basically, Coventry University, founded in eighteen forty three, is no longer considered a leading institution. Wow. What a fall from grace.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coventry University, founded in 1843, is ranked among the worlds leading institutions of higher education by many indicators, including the quality of teaching, the best student experience, the level of interaction with students, and satisfaction in the field of business and management.
